name: Ninku: Tsuyoki na Yatsura no Daigekitotsu!
overview: Ninku: Tsuyoki na Yatsura no Daigekitotsu! is a one-on-one fighting game based on the manga and anime series Ninku. It features cel-animated characters on 3D backgrounds and includes eight playable characters from the series. The game is a versus fighter in the vein of Street Fighter II, and each character has a variety of unique moves, as well as special moves that can only be executed when their special power bar has enough charge. There is a single-player arcade mode and a two-player versus mode.
